-- auto-generated definition
create table MONDIAL_AIRPORT
(
    NAME        VARCHAR2(100),
    IATACODE    VARCHAR2(3),
    COUNTRY     VARCHAR2(4),
    CITY        VARCHAR2(50),
    PROVINCE    VARCHAR2(50),
    ISLAND      VARCHAR2(50),
    LATITUDE    NUMBER,
    LONGITUDE   NUMBER,
    ELEVATION   NUMBER,
    GMTOFFSET   NUMBER,
    META_REPCOL VARCHAR2(4000)
)
/

create unique index MONDIAL_AIRPORT_PK
    on MONDIAL_AIRPORT (IATACODE)
/

create index IDX_CTX_96EB0E37CB4F26D827D53
    on MONDIAL_AIRPORT (NAME)
    indextype is CTXSYS.CONTEXT
/

create index IDX_CTX_4D77A542B6FC79737BA19
    on MONDIAL_AIRPORT (META_REPCOL)
    indextype is CTXSYS.CONTEXT
/

-- auto-generated definition
create table MONDIAL_CITY
(
    NAME        VARCHAR2(50),
    COUNTRY     VARCHAR2(4),
    PROVINCE    VARCHAR2(50),
    POPULATION  NUMBER,
    LATITUDE    NUMBER,
    LONGITUDE   NUMBER,
    ELEVATION   NUMBER,
    META_REPCOL VARCHAR2(4000)
)
/

create unique index MONDIAL_CITY_PK
    on MONDIAL_CITY (NAME, COUNTRY, PROVINCE)
/

create index IDX_CTX_FE60B9F72F739266B465C
    on MONDIAL_CITY (META_REPCOL)
    indextype is CTXSYS.CONTEXT
/

-- auto-generated definition
create table MONDIAL_BORDERS
(
    COUNTRY1    VARCHAR2(4),
    COUNTRY2    VARCHAR2(4),
    LENGTH      NUMBER,
    META_REPCOL VARCHAR2(4000)
)
/

/

create index IDX_CTX_1B6CB64FF5B4D64B5C962
    on MONDIAL_BORDERS (META_REPCOL)
    indextype is CTXSYS.CONTEXT
/

create table MONDIAL_ORGANIZATION
(
    ABBREVIATION VARCHAR2(12),
    NAME         VARCHAR2(100),
    CITY         VARCHAR2(50),
    COUNTRY      VARCHAR2(4),
    PROVINCE     VARCHAR2(50),
    ESTABLISHED  DATE,
    META_REPCOL  VARCHAR2(4000)
)
/

create unique index MONDIAL_ORGANIZATION_PK
    on MONDIAL_ORGANIZATION (ABBREVIATION)
/

create index IDX_CTX_85F389C0F838C46B8B218
    on MONDIAL_ORGANIZATION (ABBREVIATION)
    indextype is CTXSYS.CONTEXT
/

(

    on MONDIAL_POLITICS (GOVERNMENT)
    indextype is CTXSYS.CONTEXT
/

    indextype is CTXSYS.CONTEXT

-- auto-generated definition
create table MONDIAL_RIVER
(
    NAME             VARCHAR2(50),
    RIVER            VARCHAR2(50),
    LAKE             VARCHAR2(50),
    SEA              VARCHAR2(50),
    LENGTH           NUMBER,
    AREA             NUMBER,
    SOURCE           GEOCOORD,
    MOUNTAINS        VARCHAR2(50),
    SOURCEELEVATION  NUMBER,
    ESTUARY          GEOCOORD,
    ESTUARYELEVATION NUMBER,
    META_REPCOL      VARCHAR2(4000)
)
/

create unique index MONDIAL_RIVER_PK
    on MONDIAL_RIVER (NAME)
/

create index IDX_CTX_379C5662FC31CB7A2144F
    on MONDIAL_RIVER (META_REPCOL)
    indextype is CTXSYS.CONTEXT
/

create index IDX_CTX_2A1B1455FD45F9723F041
    on MONDIAL_RIVER (RIVER)
    indextype is CTXSYS.CONTEXT
/

create index IDX_CTX_5160530D5EDE4754AC3E8
    on MONDIAL_RIVER (MOUNTAINS)
    indextype is CTXSYS.CONTEXT
/

    on MONDIAL_RIVERTHROUGH (LAKE)
    indextype is CTXSYS.CONTEXT
